title: Can i still get these offers?
body:
Hello so i got awesome skins from my shop offer and i wanted to know if i can buy them.
Santa Braum , Sweetheart Sona and Fnatic Janna i already have the rp for them.
Thank you.
https://image.prntscr.com/image/4CK1fKtzRCWgQBSbYEA6PA.png

replies.body: Those are definitely sweet skins!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we'll work with you directly about honoring the original content.
OMG SONA , I WANT THAT SKIN SO BADLY EVEN WITH 10% ;_;

You should be able to, it seems that they have all the data from what skins you had on offer before the close.

From what I know, you need to send a support ticket in informing them of which skins you would like to keep, since the offers will refresh once the new shop opens.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us  ------ That should let you submit a ticket.

Good Luck!
Thank you! i already sent a ticket.
